TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPropertySheetCallback

Docs.summary: Adds the property pages for the snap-in to a property sheet.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IExtendPropertySheet.CreatePropertyPages(Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IPropertySheetCallback,System.IntPtr,Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject)> method passes a pointer to this instance of the IPropertySheetCallback interface so that the snap-in can add or remove property pages.
For more information about programming with the IPropertySheetCallback interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddPage(native int hPage) cil managed

Docs.param: The handle to a property sheet page to add to a property sheet.
Docs.summary: Adds a page to a property sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IPropertySheetCallback> interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemovePage(native int hPage) cil managed

Docs.param: The handle to a property sheet page to remove from a property sheet.
Docs.summary: Removes a page from a property sheet.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The RemovePage method can remove only pages that the snap-in has added.
For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IPropertySheetCallback> interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
